attributes.action: significantly reduce the cost of running Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have 650 odd Mps mostly claiming over 100,000 pounds each in expenses including office and staff costs plus their salaries plus ministers wages plus the army of civil servants and consultants in the rest of government. There is the overheads of all the government buildings to house these people. Then we have regional assemblies, county councils, local councils, QUANGOs plus devolved parliaments all requiring wages, expenses and overheads.  On top of all this we have the European Parliament were the costs are well documented. This lot added together is ridiculous to say the least . It makes you wonder how with all these people running things we have ended up in the mess we are.

rejection.details: The cost of Parliament is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. The cost of devolved administrations is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate. The cost of the EU is a matter for direct communication with the EU.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
